Hi, boys and girls!  _ to meet you! I am a pencil box.  _  ! I am white and yellow. I  _  the house of some school things--two  _  and three pens. Two rulers and  _ eraser are here, too.  _  are good friends.
I have good friends, too. A pencil sharpener and some books. We are  _  a black schoolbag. It is our house. Our owner  is a nice  _ . Her name is Linda. Oh!  What's  this? It's an English dictionary. It's Jane's. Jane is Linda's  _ .They are twins and they love each other very much.
